titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the right to life.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Defines "person" to include the unborn for the purpose of the right to life guarantee. Exempts from applicability of this amendment laws permitting medical procedures required to prevent the death of the mother.
